attention.text:
It is strongly recommended to back up your password before logging out.

Backup is the only option to recover access to Surf if you forget your PIN or log out of the app. If you lose your seed phrase, you will never access your funds.

logOut.hint: First store your Seed phrase safely, it is the only way to restore your wallet

safetyProtection.neverShare: Your private key may grant anyone full access to your funds. You should never share it with people or applications you do not trust.
safetyProtection.nonMainAccountPrivateKeyNote: This private key plays no role in the security of your main Surf account. However any other funds and data protected by this private key may be endangered, if the key is compromised. You should never share it with people or applications you do not trust.
safetyProtection.safelyShare: Your wallet address and public key may be safely shared with anyone.

safetyRules.description: These simple rules will help you keep your funds safe
rules: Install Surf from verified sources only (App Store, Google Play)
Backup your Seed phrase. Store it on paper in a location only you can access. Do not make a screenshot. Never keep the Seed phrase on the same device with Surf!
Do not disclose your Seed phrase to any person or to any app, other than Surf. Only use it to restore access to your wallet in Surf.
Use a PIN you can easily remember and never write it down. Don't use the same PIN in other applications. Don't share it with anyone.
Use Security Card for maximum security of your assets. It can help you restore access to your wallet even if you lose your Seed Phrase

cardsReadyToUse.description: The activated cards are equivalent. We recommend that you use one of them to confirm actions and hide the other one in a safe place
cardsReadyToUse.title: Cards are ready to use

securityCard.comingSoonText: We are also looking forward to all the new opportunities the Security Card will open up
securityCard.deactivateApprovalDescription: The cards will work only under this account and you will need to reactivate them
securityCard.detailsText:
Surf does not track you and your actions. Surf does not collect any of your data. We do not use any analytics software. We do not even have a simple tracker. No cookies. No personal data processing. Nothing. This is our calling and our mission.

Warning! However, other third-party services that we have no control over, may, at their sole discretion and volition, collect and use your data. You should be very mindful and extremely prudent in reviewing before accepting their privacy, cookies, terms of use, and any and all other contractually binding policies and documentation if you want to use their services in Surf
securityCard.detailsTitle: As we already mentioned in the Decentralization Policy

dimensions.description: We wanted to make the hardware wallet convenient and easy to use and designed it in the shape of a payment card: 85.6 mm × 53.98 mm × 0.76 mm.
dimensions.title: Dimensions

extended.description:
There is 120 KB of free space on the card so that you could write your own data on it.

We provide you with the open-source Free TON SDK,  and you can program the card with your own smart contracts and use it, for example, as a payment card, a building access card, or however you want.
extended.title: Extended use

extendedUse.description:
There is 120 KB of free space on the card, so that you could write your own data on it.

We provide you with the open source TON Labs API, and you can program the card with your own smart contracts and use it, for example, as a bank card, a building access card or whatever you need.
extendedUse.title: Extended use

hardware.description: To guarantee trouble-free operation and to mitigate security risks we used a single-chip NFC-only design (ISO 14443) and a certified secure chip SE CC EAL 6+.
hardware.title: Hardware

protection.description:
Security and privacy are our priorities. We use the CC EAL 6+ Infineon Secure Element, protected from side-channel attacks by design.
Your seed phrase never leaves the card.
Your card is assigned to your account from the moment you place the order and can be activated only for the crypto wallet that was used to order it.
protection.title: Protection

about.description:
Create a stake to take part in Free TON block validation and to profit from it. 

Stakes are pooled into nodes that participate in validator elections. When an election starts, stakes get locked. 

If your node loses, the stake is released. If it wins, the stake remains locked until the end of a validation round. When the round ends, stakes and proceeds are paid back to users.

Make a single stake or enable the Autoresume option to run multiple alternating renewable stakes. 

Note that there is a risk of full or partial stake loss due to validator misconduct
about.title: What is staking?

bot.deposit: {0} added to the stake and available for the next round. Autoresume option was enabled

errors.autoresume: Insufficient balance to make the transaction. Please top up your balance
errors.default: Error occurred. Your funds transferred back to your Surf wallet
errors.lessThanMinStake: Stake rejected: the staked amount is less than the minimum allowable
errors.noRoundsInPool: No rounds in the Staking pool
errors.notEnoughFeesForOperation: Transaction failed: insufficient amount to be received
errors.roundIsFull: The stake round limit is reached. No new stakes are accepted. Please wait until the next round
errors.stakeholderHasNoStakeInPool: No stake detected for the specified stakeholder
errors.withdraw: No tokens available for withdrawal now. Disable the stake autoresume option to withdraw from the stake
errors.withdrawError: It's impossible to withdraw funds at this time. Please try again later.

noRewardMessages.notEnoughTotal: total stake amount was not enough
noRewardMessages.roundWasFinished: Round terminated without reward payout. Reason: {0}

bot.reinvest: {0} are re-staked for the next round

age.definition: – this indicates how many rounds this DePool has been active.

annualReward.definition: – this is the expected annual interest rate of your stake, provided the DePool succesfully validates for the whole year.

assurance.definition: – this is the minimum amount of tokens the DePool owner is obliged to invest each validation round, and these funds will be the first lost, in case of any validator node malfunction. Only if they are not enough to cover the losses of the total stake, will the funds of other pool members be affected. This way the DePool owner is strongly motivated to maintain proper operation of the validator node.

availablePool.definition: – this is the maximum amount you can currently stake in Surf DePools.

balance.definition: – this is the total amount of funds in the DePool.

dePoolStaking.balanceRequirement: All actions (staking, withdrawing, etc.) require a minimum wallet balance of 0.5 tokens, which is used to pay for DePool operations. Change is returned.
dePoolStaking.contribution: Contribution to blockchain infrastructure and decentralization
dePoolStaking.description: DePool is a smart contract that allows anyone to invest stakes into a common pool, which it then uses in validator elections on behalf of the validator owning it, and upon successful validation pays rewards to all members proportionally to their contribution.

lockUpPeriod.definition: – this is how long your funds are locked in the DePool after it enters elections. When you decide to withdraw your funds, they will be returned to you as soon as they are unlocked, meaning no later than one full lock-up period after you request withdrawal.

members.definition: – this is the current number of members in the DePool.

minStake.definition: – this is the minimum stake set in the DePool. You cannot stake less than this amount.

rewardFee.definition: – this is the percentage of your reward that goes to the DePool owner for maintaining the DePool and the validator node.

rewardPaid.definition: – this is how much all participants of Surf DePools have earned in total up until now.

dePoolStaking.staking: Staking is a new way of depositing funds on the blockchain. Delegate tokens to DePool smart contract and enjoy your rewards every day. And you also get benefits.

successful.definition: — percentage of all validation rounds the DePools participated in, where it won validator elections, successfully completed validation and received its reward.
